Area shortlist scorecard (2–3 areas)

A scorecard to shortlist areas based on your family’s real priorities: pace, commute, walkability, and community.

#areas#neighborhoods#planning
Pillar: Costs & budgeting for a Bali move

Scorecard

Rate each area 1–5.

  • Pace / calm
  • Commute tolerance
  • Walkability
  • Kid-friendly activities
  • Parent community fit
  • Noise (street-level, not “area-level”)

Tip

Don’t over-optimize before you arrive. Pick 2–3, then test-stay.

Related

  • Areas hub
  • Where to live guide

Next steps

If you’re new to the idea, follow the roadmap. If you’re already committed, jump into visas, housing, and areas.
